extendedInfo.description: From time to time prospects arise, just as a light source illuminates our lives. Besides hard work, to achieve success also requires opportunity at just the right time. If the moment of opportunity was uncovered, then we could seize the chance to secure our life direction.Every turning point in life will most definitely bring variations, such as job changes, relationship fluctuation, and career alteration. Our fates are forever changing, so we need to grasp the opportunity to achieve those important and meaningful tasks. With either small changes or big transformations, they are challenges that we need to accomplish to have a complete life.If we can learn the important points of our life, then we can benefit ourselves and achieve a highly satisfied life.Supported Languages:EnglishSimplified Chinese (ç®ä½ä¸­æ)Traditional Chinese (ç¹é«ä¸­æ)
